peril.views.slick.components

Class TextField

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.views.slick.components.TextField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component

    public final class TextField
extends java.lang.Object
implements Component
    This object is a visual component that can be used to display a block of text on the screen.
    Since:
    2018-03-14
    Version:
    1.01.03
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    Component

      • TextField

        public TextField(int maxWidth,
                 Point position)

    • Method Detail

      • addText

        public void addText(java.lang.String text)
        Adds a section of text to a next line in this TextField. If the text is longer than the maximum value it will wrap onto the following line using at the SPACE character. init() must be called before this method.
        Parameters:
        text - The text to be added to the TextField

      • addText

        public void addText(java.lang.String text,
                    java.lang.String lineWrap)
        Adds a section of text to a next line in this TextField. If the text is longer than the maximum value it will wrap onto the following line using at the specified character. init() must be called before this method.
        Parameters:
        text - The text to be added to the TextField
        lineWrap - The character used to separate the words in the text.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears all the lines from this TextField.

        public void init()
        Initialises this TextField.
        Specified by:
        init in interface Component

      • draw

        public void draw(Frame frame)
        Draws this TextField on the screen. init() must be called before this method.
        Specified by:
        draw in interface Component
        Parameters:
        frame - The Frame that displays this TextField on screen.

      • showBackground

        public void showBackground()
        Shows the background box of this TextField.
